channel.title: Making corrupted on a f2p pvp?
channel.description:
i've been thinking about this lately...
and iw as just wondering if someone could guide me through on.. how to make a "corrupted" dragon item on cammy pvp or other pvp 317's ...
as in...
the regular dragon item... but! ... it deletes from the holder after used a certain ammount of time? or something like that...
please and thank you(:
